shortdesc.ph: Starts an audio recording on the client.

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated as of v2.9.1. It has a fixed recording sample rate of 32 kHz. Please use the method instead.

section.p:
The Agora SDK allows recording during a call. This method records the audio of all the users in the channel and generates an audio recording file. Supported formats of the recording file are as follows:
.wav: Large file size with high fidelity.
.aac: Small file size with low fidelity.
Ensure that the directory for the recording file exists and is writable. This method should be called after the method. The recording automatically stops when you call the method.

plentry.pd: The absolute path of the recording file specified by the user. The file path must include the file name and its format. For example: /sdcard/emulated/0/audio/aac C:/music/audio.aac /var/mobile/Containers/Data/audio.aac.
